page.title: 05 LODDINGTON HOME LIFE
page.content:
LEISURE. Few people pursued a regular leisure activity. About one fifth went to Evening Classes and a few were regular pub patrons. About three-quarters of those interviewed would visit theatres, concert-halls or restaurants occasionally.
PETS. Of those replying about eighty % kept a pet. Dogs were by far the most popular while the miscellaneous group includes goldfish, rabbits, ferrets and a tortoise. Out of 50 replies there were 29 dogs, 11 cats, 3 budgerigars, 6 horses and 16 miscellaneous.
